files.description: Python script that scans ONLY the canonical outputs/ tree and generates or refreshes outputs/ARTIFACT_INDEX.md with required deliverables linked via correct relative paths plus a complete discovered-files section.

missionDescription: Generate/refresh /outputs/ARTIFACT_INDEX.md by scanning ONLY the canonical /outputs tree, ensuring every required deliverable is linked with correct relative paths (report, pilot case study, rights log, schemas, QA outputs, tracker).
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Discoverability remains a systemic failure; an authoritative canonical index is required for auditing and to prevent regressions to runtime/outputs or agent-specific paths.
